description.value:
Cleric Subdomain

Associated Domain(s): Chaos, Evil

Associated Deities: Abraxas, Aldinach, Andirifkhu, Angazhan, Apep, Areshkagal, Baphomet, Camazotz, Cyth-V'sug, Daclau-Sar, Dagon, Dahak, Deskari, Dretha, Flauros, Ghlaunder, Gogunta, Gyronna, Haagenti, Haggakal, Izyagna, Jezelda, Jubilex, Kabriri, Kitumu, Kostchtchie, Kro'akoth, Lady Nanbyo, Lamashtu, Lanishra, Mazmezz, Menxyr, Mestama, Murnath, Nightripper, Nocticula, Nulgreth, Nurgal, Orcus, Ovonovo, Pazuzu, Rovagug, Rull, Sezelrian, Shamira, Shax, Shivaska, Sifkesh, Sithhud, Socothbenoth, Thamir Gixx, Thremyr, Treerazor, Urazra, Urxehl, Varg, Xoveron, Ydersius, Yhidothrus, Zagresh, Zevgavizeb, Zogmugot, Zura

Replacement Power: The following granted power replaces the touch of chaos power of the Chaos domain or the touch of evil power of the Evil domain. Demons are a race of chaotic evil outsiders.

Replacement Domain Spells: 1st-doom, 3rd-rage, 6th-planar binding (demons only).
